name: Java Fast Method Call Graph Generator
short_description: The project's aim is to develop a fast Method Call Graph generator for the Java Programming Language. The search proceedure combines a Finite State Machine and ad hoc parsing to allow for fast access to method definitions and method calls within the source code.
summary: Analysis tool that generates method call graphs
